E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 5/12/1974
Subject: Progress of Goose Gregson
Dear Sir,
Goose Gregson has nothing more to prove at A Tampa Tarpons!
He has an ERA of 0.43 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/15/1974
Subject: Joe McIntosh healing process
Joe McIntosh is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Saturday, 5/17/1974
Subject: Juan Lopez
Juan Lopez is ready to be activated from the DL!

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Tuesday, 5/20/1974
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Joe Torre
